name: Chicken in the Darkness
description: The game "Chicken in the darkness" is a roguelike-indie-horror game developed by 3 highschool students. The main character, a highschool student who lives in a dorm, plans with his friends to order a fried chicken and get delivered.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual core CPU @2GHz (Intel Pentium or higher) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce 8800, ATI 1950 or higher DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core CPU @2GHz AMD or Intel Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 750 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
